subject: Re: svn commit: samba r22912 - in branches/SAMBA_3_0_25/source: .
body:
On Tue, May 15, 2007 at 08:58:59PM +0200, Volker Lendecke wrote:
> On Tue, May 15, 2007 at 04:56:21PM +0000, jra@samba.org wrote:
> > Log:
> > As I'd merged James's fix, it's my fault and I need to merge
> > Volker's build fix :-(. From r22892
> > "Fix the build, it did not find that gettimeofday takes two arguments on
> > my box. AC_TRY_LINK seems not to take a main { } frame."
> > Jeremy.
> 
> Sorry, I did not think that this had made it into 3.0.25.

NP, I was trying to keep builds up to date for 3.0.25a that's all.
